original_text: But still death ruled all people, from the time when Adam lived until the time when Moses lived. Everyone died, even those who did not fail in the same way that Adam failed.
korean_text: 그러나 아담으로부터 모세까지 아담의 범죄와 같은 죄를 짓지 아니한 자들까지도 사망이 왕 노릇 하였나니 아담은 오실 자의 모형이라

sentences.original_text: But still death ruled all people
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 여전히 사망이 모든 사람을 다스렸습니다

sentences.original_text: from the time when Adam lived
until the time when Moses lived
even those who did not fail
in the same way that Adam failed
